SELECT C.NOTC_IDX, C.TITLE, C.CONT, TO_CHAR(C.REG_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DTTM, TO_CHAR(C.MOD_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MOD_DTTM, C.USE_YN, C.APP_ID, C.START_DTTM, C.END_DTTM, D.SVC_NM FROM TB_MOB_NOTC C , ( SELECT A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_NM , A.APP_ID FROM TB_SVC A , TB_MOB_SVC B , TB_SVC_AUTH C , TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP D WHERE A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.SVC_ID = C.SVC_ID AND C.AUTH_GRP_ID = D.AUTH_GRP_ID AND D.USER_ID = #{USER_ID} ) D WHERE C.APP_ID = D.APP_ID
AND D.APP_ID = #{APP_ID}
AND C.TITLE LIKE '%' || #{TITLE} || '%'
AND C.CONT LIKE '%' || #{CONT} || '%'
ORDER BY C.NOTC_IDX DESC

SELECT A.SVC_ID , A.SVC_NM , A.APP_ID FROM TB_SVC A , TB_MOB_SVC B , TB_SVC_AUTH C , TB_SYS_USER_AUTH_GRP D WHERE A.SVC_ID = B.SVC_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.SVC_ID = C.SVC_ID AND C.AUTH_GRP_ID = D.AUTH_GRP_ID AND D.USER_ID = #{USER_ID}

SELECT A.NOTC_IDX, A.TITLE, A.CONT, TO_CHAR(A.REG_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS REG_DTTM, TO_CHAR(A.MOD_DTTM, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS MOD_DTTM, A.USE_YN, A.APP_ID, A.START_DTTM, A.END_DTTM, B.SVC_NM FROM TB_MOB_NOTC A INNER JOIN TB_SVC B ON A.APP_ID = B.APP_ID WHERE A.NOTC_IDX = #{NOTC_IDX}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_MOB_NOTC ( NOTC_IDX , TITLE, CONT, REG_DTTM , MOD_DTTM, USE_YN , APP_ID , START_DTTM, END_DTTM ) VALUES ( SEQ_TB_MOB_NOTC.NEXTVAL , #{TITLE}, #{CONT}, SYSDATE , SYSDATE , #{USE_YN} , #{APP_ID} , #{START_DTTM}, #{END_DTTM} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_MOB_NOTC SET TITLE = #{TITLE}, CONT = #{CONT}, APP_ID= #{APP_ID}, USE_YN = #{USE_YN}, START_DTTM = #{START_DTTM}, END_DTTM = #{END_DTTM}, MOD_DTTM = SYSDATE WHERE NOTC_IDX = #{NOTC_IDX}
